name: Sajed
recipeDetails: Clean the koi fish and marinate with salt and turmeric.Heat oil in a pan, fry the fish lightly, and set aside.In the same oil, sauté onions, tomatoes, ginger, garlic, and spices.Add water, bring to a boil, then add the fried fish and simmer.Garnish with fresh coriander and serve hot with rice!
